text: Kari Stai Kari Stai (born 1974) is a Norwegian illustrator, graphic designer and children's writer. In 2012, she was awarded the Brage Prize for children's literature with her Jakob og Neikob. Tjuven slår tilbake. ==References== ==External links== *Kari Stai's website Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian illustrators Category:Norwegian graphic designers Category:Norwegian women artists Category:Norwegian women writers Category:Norwegian children's writers Category:Norwegian women illustrators Category:Norwegian children's book illustrators Category:People from Trondheim Category:21st-century Norwegian writers Category:21st-century women writers Category:Women graphic designers
